author: marvin
msg: Add a new handshake utilizing the same RPC mechanism as every other call.
Leave the old handshake mechanism in place for now.

author: marvin
msg: Change argument passing conventions so that downstream subroutines don't mess

author: marvin
msg: Change the application protocol used by the LucyX::Remote classes to be
something more friendly to non-blocking sockets (packed length followed by
binary buffer, rather than a mix of line-oriented and binary).

author: veithen
msg: AXIOM-398: Enabled a test for a particular case that was actually fixed by r1201478.
